definition: to ponder earnestly/to give a lot of thought to sth
good/very/very much
bitter/hardship/pain/to suffer/to bring suffering to/painstakingly
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Shirley stars took the car keys, my heart thanks for Jeff han.
sentences.chinese: 厲辰星接過車鑰匙，對韓志傑的良苦用心表示感謝。

sentences.english: Besides, we ought to realize our parents' good intentions.
sentences.chinese: 況且我們應該體會父母的良苦用心。

sentences.english: Children see their parents ' good intentions, also decided to nurture the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 孩子看到父母的良苦用心，也決定要孕育下一代。

sentences.english: We can communicate with their parents at home, understand parents' heart.
sentences.chinese: 在家裏在能夠與父母溝通，理解父母的良苦用心。

sentences.english: Hey, my comrades, why can't you just understand my good intentions?
sentences.chinese: 哎，同志們，你們怎麼就不能理解我的良苦用心呢？
